metadata.dc:author: Grisoni, E
de Agustín, J C
Kalhan, S C
metadata.dc:description: Intestinal wall necrosis without perforation was produced in six dogs. Another group of three dogs served as a control. The histologic findings, the degree of ischemia and scintigraphic images obtained after the infusions of autologous white blood cells labelled with indium-111 oxine were correlated. Positive scans were obtained in all the dogs with proven intestinal ischemia. Negative scans appeared in the dogs without ischemic insult and a false-positive scan were observed in a control dog with diarrhea.
metadata.dc:title: Diagnóstico precoz de la isquemia intestinal mediante estudio gammagráfico.
[The early diagnosis of intestinal ischemia by gammagraphic study].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cirugia pediatrica : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Cirugia Pediatrica
